Translations.Text: He manusa, tomara allahara galagraha. Ara allaha; tini abhabamukta, prasansita.
Tini iccha karale tomaderake bilupta kare eka natuna srstira udbhaba karabena.

Ke'u aparera bojha bahana karabe na. Ke'u yadi tara gurutara bhara bahana karate an'yake ahabana kare ke'u ta bahana karabe na-yadi se nikatabarti atniya'o haya. Apani kebala taderake satarka karena, yara tadera palanakartake na dekhe'o bhaya kare ebam namaya kayema kare. Ye ke'u nijera sansodhana kare, se sansodhana kare, sbiya kalyanera jan'ye'i allahara nikata'i sakalera pratyabartana.
Ara'o samana naya jibita o mrta. Allaha srabana karana yake iccha. Apani kabare sayitaderake sunate saksama nana.
Ami apanake satyadharmasaha pathiyechi sambadadata o satarkakarirupe. Emana kona sampradaya ne'i yate satarkakari aseni.
Tara yadi apanara prati mithyaropa kare, tadera purbabartira'o mithyaropa karechila. Tadera kache tadera rasulagana spasta nidarsana, sahipha ebam ujjala kitabasaha esechilena.
Atahpara ami kapheraderake dhrta karechilama. Kemana chila amara ayaba
